org.aaronhe.threetengson

Class ThreeTenGsonAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aaronhe.threetengson.ThreeTenGsonAdapter

  • public class ThreeTenGsonAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    ThreeTenGsonAdapter contains static methods for registering ThreeTen BP type on GsonBuilder.

      • registerAll

        public static com.google.gson.GsonBuilder registerAll(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder gsonBuilder)
        A convenient method to register all supported ThreeTen BP types.
        Parameters:
        gsonBuilder - a GsonBuilder to be registered.
        Returns:
        a GsonBuilder knows how to de/serialize all supported ThreeTen BP types.
